title: Lily

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may plant a lily at a player's house on Odd Nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Lilies heal your target and all of their visitors.
- You may plant at your house.
- Lilies cannot protect you or Plaguebearers from attacks.
- When dead, you may plant a lily once.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to plant a lily at (player)'s house.
"Your target was attacked!"

"You were attacked but someone nursed you back to health!"

desc:
Post 160
*You are a reborn meditative aid that mends wounds with mystical flowers.*
